name: Garden Grind
description:
Do you ever just want to casually farm on your field? Well this is not the case, you will be annoyed by multiple events that will make farming a nightmare. Luckily you can move plants to avoid dangerous events.

Your main goal is to earn as much gold as possible but be careful - resources can be easily depleted and you will be stuck with dried plants.

How to grow plants: You need to plant a seed, water it and fertilize it and once the plant is fully grown, harvest it.

Controls: Mouse or key shortcuts to select tools and items
